Wolverhampton

Cyber Security Society

Cyber Soc membership is open to everyone!

Join Now

Welcome

This is the website for the University of Wolverhamptons Cyber Security Society. Membership is beneficial to anyone studying a subject within the IT field, Management and Business students may also find keeping current on cyber security provides an advantage as well. Additionally, anyone with an interest in cyber security may find membership useful.

What We Do

In keeping with the aims of the society we regularly meet to share knowledge and support eachothers learning. We aim to provide oppurtunities to network, we create learning materials, organise trips, invite guest speakers and run events.

Presentations & Events

Throughout the year we run events and presentations designed to keep you up-to-date on cyber issues.

Learning & Support

We are a group of students and staff who get together to share knowledge and support eachothers learning.

Networking

Through regular meetings, events and presentations, often with guest speakers you have the oppurtunity to network.

Upcoming Events

This section will contain upcoming events once they have been scheduled.

Our Blog

Keep up-to-date with the latest society news. We also create articles on variosu cyber security subjects here.
